title: File Explorer Sidebar
description: The File Explorer Sidebar serves as a primary navigation and file management tool within the application. It provides a user-friendly interface for exploring project files and directories, enabling users to efficiently access and manage code.
acceptance_criteria: The File Explorer Sidebar is displayed as a fixed-width sidebar, ensuring accessibility from any point within the application.
The Sidebar includes a list of sections or tabs, each representing a different functionality (e.g., file explorer, settings, recent files).
Users can navigate between different sections by clicking on their respective tabs.
Each section within the Sidebar can be expanded and collapsed to reveal or hide its content.
The File Explorer Sidebar includes a resizer, allowing users to adjust its width to their preference.
The Sidebar is designed to be responsive and adaptable to different screen sizes, ensuring a seamless experience across various devices.
The Sidebar is visually appealing and adheres to the application's overall design language.
